section.title: customer types creating new Customer Type
section.para: To create a new Customer Type, select the NEW button. The following screen will appear:

tip.para: Create your Customer Types using a logical, hierarchical structure. This will make it easier to retrieve Customer Type information in the future. For more information on matching patterns using Regular Expressions, see .

section.para: When creating a new Customer Type, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Enter a code number to identify the Customer Type.
Enter a description to identify the Customer Type.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:
